list.name: (start)
list.query: select text,generatorHost,application,title FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*started$/ GROUP BY generatorHost,application,title)

list.name: (stop)
list.query: select "text", "generatorHost", "application" FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*ended$/ GROUP BY  "generatorHost", "application")

targets.query:
SELECT sum("state_duration") as "state_duration" FROM (
SELECT sum("sum_idle_seconds") as "state_duration" FROM "7d"."pg_stat_activity_idle_in_transaction" WHERE ("host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/ AND "state" =~ /^${state:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "datname", "state", "usename", "query_md5" fill(null)
) WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

) WHERE $timeFilter

targets.query:
SELECT sum("state_suration") as "state_suration" FROM (
SELECT sum("avg_state_seconds") as "state_suration" FROM "7d"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE ("host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/ AND "state" =~ /^${state:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "usename", "datname", "state" fill(null)
) WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT sum("state_suration") as "state_suration" FROM (
SELECT sum("avg_state_seconds") as "state_suration" FROM "7d"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE ("host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/ AND "state" =~ /^${state:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "usename", "datname", "state" fill(null)
) WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval), "usename"

SELECT sum("avg_state_seconds") as "state_suration" FROM "7d"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE ("host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/ AND "state" =~ /^${state:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "usename", "datname", "state" fill(null)
) WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval), "datname"

SELECT sum("state_suration") as "state_suration" FROM (
SELECT sum("avg_state_seconds") as "state_suration" FROM "7d"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE ("host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/ AND "state" =~ /^${state:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "usename", "datname", "state" fill(null)
) WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval), "state"

panels.title: Max Transaction Duration (state = idle in transaction)

targets.query:
SELECT top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}), "Total", "Mean", "Count", "query_md5", "usename"
FROM (SELECT sum("transaction_duration") AS "Total", mean("transaction_duration") AS "Mean", count("transaction_duration") AS "Count" FROM "autogen"."pg_stat_activity" WHERE ("state" = 'idle in transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "query_md5", "usename") WHERE  $timeFilter

SELECT top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}), "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Mean","% Shared Hit","% Local Hit",  "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean", sum("shared_blks_hit")  / ( sum("shared_blks_hit") + sum("shared_blks_read")) AS "% Shared Hit", sum("local_blks_hit")  / ( sum("local_blks_hit") + sum("local_blks_read")) AS "% Local Hit" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter AND time > now()-1d GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean", sum("shared_blks_hit")  / ( sum("shared_blks_hit") + sum("shared_blks_read")) AS "% Shared Hit", sum("local_blks_hit")  / ( sum("local_blks_hit") + sum("local_blks_read")) AS "% Local Hit" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter AND time < now()-1d GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
)
WHERE "Calls">0 AND Total>=0 AND $timeFilter

SELECT top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}), "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Mean", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND "query" =~/.*${filter:regex}.*/ AND  $timeFilter AND time > now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND "query" =~/.*${filter:regex}.*/ AND $timeFilter AND time < now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
)

SELECT "Calls", top(${TOP_by}, ${TOP}), "Total", "Rows","Mean", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND "query" =~/${filter:regex}/  AND $timeFilter AND time > now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND "query" =~/${filter:regex}/  AND $timeFilter AND time < now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
)

SELECT "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Max","Mean" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", max("max_time") AS "Max", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter AND time > now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
),
(
SELECT sum("calls") AS "Calls", sum("duration") AS "Total", sum("rows") AS "Rows", max("max_time") AS "Max", sum("duration")  / sum("calls") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_diff" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND $timeFilter AND time < now()-$new GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"
)
WHERE "Calls">0 AND Total>=0 AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5", "query"

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("count") FROM "${new}"."pg_stat_activity_count"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
list.label: PostgreSQL host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("count") FROM "${new}"."pg_stat_activity_count"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("count") FROM "${new}"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/   AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")
list.label: PostgreSQL DB
list.name: datname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("count") FROM "${new}"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/   AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("count") FROM "${new}"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "usename")

list.tagsQuery: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_10m") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/  AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("state") FROM (SELECT last("count") FROM "${new}"."pg_stat_activity_count" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "state")

list.name: state

list.tagsQuery: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_10m") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/  AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition:
SELECT "query_md5", top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}) 
FROM (SELECT sum("transaction_duration") AS "Total", mean("transaction_duration") AS "Mean", count("transaction_duration") AS "Count" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_activity" WHERE ("state" = 'idle in transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "query_md5")
list.label: Filter
list.name: filter
list.query:
SELECT "query_md5", top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}) 
FROM (SELECT sum("transaction_duration") AS "Total", mean("transaction_duration") AS "Mean", count("transaction_duration") AS "Count" FROM "$new"."pg_stat_activity" WHERE ("state" = 'idle in transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datname" =~ /^$datname$/ AND "usename" =~ /^$usename$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "query_md5")
